<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="HSC Suggestions">72e2e1c69334c2105d94371efaba109d</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>HSC Suggestion - ShortDescCSS</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
  var shortDescElement = document.getElementById('short_description');
    
    if (shortDescElement) {
        // Apply CSS styles to make the font bold
        shortDescElement.style.fontWeight = 'bold';
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-07-29 07:26:11</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>9f002abb83678e10fa6256a6feaad320</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>HSC Suggestion - ShortDescCSS</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="HSC Employee Center" source="x_1093559_hsc_em_0">2a4bbb98933c42105d94371efaba10a0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="HSC Employee Center">2a4bbb98933c42105d94371efaba10a0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_9f002abb83678e10fa6256a6feaad320</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-07-29 07:28:15</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><va_supported>false</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
